attributes.action: pubicly investagate the Bilderberg Group and their influences over policy in this country and the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the 1950's this secretive group meeet annually to set global policy including recent leaked documents from the 1955 meeting setting up the ECC and EU.  There is a compete media blackout on the group who this May are meeting in Athens, Greece.

Past attendee's include Bill Clinton (1991); Henry Kissinger (1957, 1964, 1966, 1971, 1973, 1974, 1977-2008); Ed Balls (2006); Peter Mandelson (1999); Tony Blair (1993); Kenneth Clarke (1993, 1998, 2006, 2007 & 2008); George Osborne (2006, 2007& 2008) and David Rockefeller.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
